model_name: Photorealistic AI Influencer ‚Äì Woman877 ‚Äì Character LoRA [SD1.5 | SDXL | Flux]

civitai.name: V2 (SFW) - SDXL
civitai.description:
If you like this LoRA, leave a thumbs up on this page. It really helps a lot!


Got a lot of feedback that V1 leaned too much into NSFW and was hard to prompt for clothing. V2 improves on that a lot. It's trained on my new dataset (shared in my private Discord, link in bio). You might notice some differences in output, but V2 is much stronger with clothing prompts while still being capable of NSFW. V1 is still perfect if you're going for NSFW, since it has more training on the nude body.

Have fun!

model.name: Photorealistic AI Influencer ‚Äì Woman877 ‚Äì Character LoRA [SD1.5 | SDXL | Flux]
model.description:

Meet Woman877 (read text)

A fully AI-generated, photorealistic influencer-style character LoRA, trained with precision to showcase what's possible using my own LoRA creation method.


This model represents:
A 25-year-old French woman, light beige skin with natural freckles, thick jet blonde layered hair with soft waves framing her oval face, brown eyes, graceful posture, and a petite frame.

She often appears in natural light, wearing soft fabrics like knitted sweaters, surrounded by warm indoor tones. The gallery images were prompted accordingly.

üéØ What makes Woman877 unique?

  • Fully AI-generated from scratch, based on a single consistent face identity

  • Trained on 130+ dataset images using my proven 7-step Character LoRA Workflow

  • No cherry-picking, no Photoshop, just raw model output, straight from the LoRA. I‚Äôve included the full prompt and settings with every image.

  • Designed for photorealism with personality, freckles, expression, posture and all

  • Ideal for creators who want a reliable, reusable character for influencer-style portraits, storytelling or testing realism in SDXL workflows

  • Dataset fully created with AnalogMadness XL3 by CornmeisterNL
    (XL3 is available for 2k Buzz. Probably the best Buzz I‚Äôve spent.)

üîß Behind the Build

Her face was initially generated with the following base prompt:

Face photo of a 25-year-old French woman, light beige skin with natural freckles, neutral backdrop.

From this, I created a complete dataset with consistent lighting, poses, outfits, and compositions using my refined prompt structure. This resulted in a powerful and highly reusable character LoRA, perfect for test renders, creative shoots, and photorealistic AI portraits.

Dataset

Part of the dataset she was created on

üîç No cherry-picking, no Photoshop ‚Äì raw output only

Every image in the gallery below was generated using this exact LoRA, with no retouching, no post-processing, and no cherry-picking of lucky shots. What you see is exactly what the LoRA delivers.

That means you‚Äôll also see what a character LoRA can‚Äôt do ‚Äì and that‚Äôs intentional.

For example:

  • Freckles and moles won‚Äôt always appear in the exact same spot

  • Skin texture and tiny details may vary across generations

  • The freckles in this model are irregular, but that‚Äôs realistic ‚Äì freckles naturally come and go.
    Exposure to UV light (especially in spring and summer) increases melanin production, making freckles darker or more visible üòâ

If you're looking for perfect facial symmetry or identical skin details across all renders, you‚Äôve got two options:

  1. Do manual post-processing (e.g. with Photoshop or ADetailer)

  2. Choose a smoother-skinned base model without unique features like freckles or moles

This LoRA wasn‚Äôt trained to be plastic-perfect, it was trained to be photorealistic, reusable, and creatively flexible.

‚ú® Want to create your own character LoRA?

If you want to create your own consistent character LoRA ‚Äî and you have (or can get) access to Automatic1111 ‚Äî join my Creator Access on Fanvue.

You‚Äôll get:

‚Ä¢ My full photorealistic workflow
‚Ä¢ The 7-step method for building consistent and reusable character LoRAs (NSFW)
‚Ä¢ The 8-step method for building a consistent character Instagram model LoRA (SFW)
‚Ä¢ Prompts, settings, sample images and ongoing support for my workflows

‚Üí https://www.fanvue.com/huslyo123/fv-3
See everything that‚Äôs included: https://huslyo123.carrd.co/

üöÄ Now it‚Äôs your turn

Now you can start creating with this LoRA yourself. Use her, remix her, make something beautiful.

You have my full permission to use Woman877 for anything you like ‚Äì commercial, non-commercial, private use, whatever suits your project.

Turn her into an Instagram star, an AI girlfriend, a story character, a moodboard muse ‚Äì you decide.

That‚Äôs the fun of it.

Can‚Äôt wait to see what you create with Woman877. Tag me if you want to share the results!

üî• Best practices for his LoRA


Always start with the following base prompt for the most consistent results:

"A 25-year-old French woman, light beige skin with natural freckles, thick jet blonde layered hair with soft waves framing her oval face, brown eyes, graceful posture, and a petite frame."

To maintain facial consistency, always include a facial reference (see the image under the heading Behind the Build). Use ControlNet or a similar tool to lock in facial features.

To avoid overly revealing or unintended results, set LoRA strenght to 0.6 and be as specific as possible when describing clothing. For example:

"wearing a long-sleeve high-collar floral print dress that falls mid-calf, cinched with a narrow leather belt, black tights and loafers"

You can also guide the output by using a strong negative prompt. Add to the negative prompt: naked, nude, cleavage, underboob, sideboob, sheer, see-through, lingerie, exposed breasts, nsfw, nipples, areola, erotic to steer clear of NSFW content.

This section will be updated regularly as I refine the workflow. Thanks for your feedback and happy prompting!

Always use trigger word woman877 <lora:woman877:0.8>

LoRA name: <lorawoman877>
Trigger word: woman877

‚ú® Learn my full method for building character LoRAs ‚Üíhttps://www.fanvue.com/huslyo123/fv-3

‚ö†Ô∏è Disclaimer

This model was not trained on any real person and is not based on any existing individual.
All dataset images were fully AI-generated for the sole purpose of creating a consistent fictional character.
Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental.
